column4: Hi i use Ubuntu the first time an i have some problems with the ati-driver-installer-11-11-x86.x86_64.run i use it with Ati Powercolour 3850HD Agp an after the installation the bootscreen iss in small resolution swap to 1920x1080 when desktop runs iss okay because  i have no graphical power in Ubunto 10.04.3 Lts it feels Ati chipset iss not running no power on desktop i use Ati with asus a7n8xe and 2 gig ram 3200XP Amd(old system)and after

a small time ubuntu freeze in i must take a newstart.The problem iss not with this driver alone the problem iss with all fglrx drivers for ati the standart graphic driver runs without problems an desktop power because i want more power to game with fglrx driver on Ubuntu iss there anywone who can help me to config this in Ubuntu or iss that not possible with Ati 3850HD AGP.
iss here german help in this CHat?
Please don't flood; use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste; don't use Enter as punctuation.
